short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows your location and IP address so you can check if your VPN works!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, you can check if your VPN or location spoofing is working/turned-on by clicking the extension icon. It will show your location and IP address.
